regen.absent_element: automatic transfer to Shunting from Stand By operation
regen.new_specification: The system shall allow automatic transfer to Shunting from Stand By operation at speeds equal or lower to the supervised shunting speed with confirmation from the driver.

label: Before authomatic transition to Shunting, ETCS shall request confirmation from the driver.
absence: confirmation from the driver if authomatic transition to Shunting
